三陸沖/北海道根室半島沖: Sea off of Sanriku/Nemuro Peninsula in Hokkaido
大湊より、出撃！三陸沖から\n北海道根室沖の海域を哨戒、\n北方近海の安全確保を: Depart from Ominato! Patrol the waters off Sanriku and Nemuro, Hokkaido, and secure the waters near the north! 104th Squadron, set sail!
昭南(シンガポール)より日本\n本土方面に戦略物資を輸送す\nる南号作戦を実施せ: Carry out Operation Nangou to transport strategic materials from Singapore to the Japanese mainland! Stay alert for submarines! Fleet, set sail!
八丈島沖絶対哨戒線:
Hachijou Island Seas
Decisive Patrol Line
八丈島沖/房総半島東方沖: Sea off of Hachijou Island/Off East of Bōsō Peninsula
八丈島の防備を固め、同海域\n周辺の敵潜水艦を制圧！また\n呉より来援する連合艦: Fortify the defenses of Hachijou Island and subdue the enemy submarines in the area! Also, intercept the enemy task force group with the combined fleet coming from Kure!
連合艦隊、出撃！対空警戒を厳に房総沖に\n前進せよ！ この海域から敵を叩き出せッ:
Combined fleet, sortie! Proceed to the waters
off Bōsō while staying on strict anti-aircraft
     alert! Knock the enemy out of this area!
